author: lgray
body: This pull requests integrates a first functioning version of the MTD "TrackExtender". It extrapolates tracks to the MTD surface, finds all dets compatible with the track extrapolation, searches for the hit with the best estimated chi2, and if found adds it to the track. The amount of updating that is done to the track is presently configurable. It is possible to update separately the hit pattern, TrackExtra, and the track parameters. This allows MTD to perform studies while not directly impacting the tracking performance, where we presently see a 3% degradation in resolution for 1GeV single muons when including the MTD hits in the track fit. Likely due to material mis-modeling. There is a test configuration in RecoMTD/TrackExtender/test/ that will run the track extender and produce products for the D24 scenario. Otherwise the TrackExtender is not included in the RECO, and that integration will come in a separate PR. title: 1st Version of MTD Hit-Finder and Track Refitter
